Description: Two shells drawn on object card, only one preserved. Small, hollow, conical shaped shell with spiral and natural cross hatching to the exterior surface. A small broken hole in the underside. Probably used as beads.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.8A, between levels 1-2
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 137)
